title: Hamza-Ouessleti
author: Hamza-Ouessleti
content: Greetings, I hope this post finds you well. I am reaching out to the members of this esteemed community to request your valuable input for an academic survey as a part of scientific research concerning ‘Keys for a successful Security Token Offering from investors’ perspective’. This topic is significant for the development of the STO field both for investors and issuers to promote success chances in the offering. The purpose of this survey is to gather insights and actual STO investors’ opinions on their motives to invest in STOs which consequently drives STO to success. Your participation will significantly contribute to the depth and quality of the research findings. By sharing your knowledge and experience, you will help advance the global understanding in this field.Rest assured, your responses will be treated with utmost confidentiality and anonymity. The survey will take approximately 3 months to be completed. Regarding the significance of the topic, the results of this survey will be communicated to interested participants later.To participate in the survey, please click on the following Google Docs link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdD6RhqaCHaC5wclDA8iv3yNR6CC5pymxxSkr6XoqmVPRURbA/viewform If you have any questions or concerns regarding the survey, please contact me at wessleti.hamza2@gmail.com. Thank you in advance for your consideration and willingness to contribute to the survey. Your participation is valuable and sincerely appreciated.Best regards, Hamza Ouessleti.

comments.author: Bit_Happy
comments.body: Hello, welcome to the forum.FYI, I sometimes use large text for section titles and important points, but you don't need to "shout" with the whole post. Just trying to help.
